handDesc.p: The akṣaras are of square form which is characteristic of the script belonging to the reign of Jayavarman VII.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

lg.l: vrahmarṣer iva devarājam aditir devī sudharmmāśritaṁ
ekaṁ kr̥taṁ vidhir avekṣya vidhitsur arttham·
gacchaty ayam mama kr̥te samitīty atīva
koṭi-kramair api na laṅghayituñ ca lokān·

div.p: The edition, first typed in with corrections and occasional observations by Gerdi Ger- schheimer, is based on that of Cœdès in BEFEO 6 of 1906, pp. 44–81, with a few further corrections gleaned from Jacques’s edition and translation (2007: 89–113) or proposed during reading sessions.

First edited by George Cœdès (44-81) with a French translation; re-edited here by Dominic Goodall and S.L.P. Anjaneya Sarma (EFEO) in the context of the ERC DHARMA project during reading sessions in 2021-2022, in which Kunthea Chhom, Harunaga Isaacson, S. A. S. Sarma, R. Sathyanarayanan, Judit Törzsök and others participated.
